tweet: The economics of wind energy changed dramatically over the past twenty years, as the cost of wind power has fallen approximately 90 percent.

Did you know the energy that can be tapped from the wind is proportional to the cube of the wind speed.
Clean Energy Fact: All things being equal, a wind turbine at 16 MPH will generate nearly 50% more electricity than it would at 14 MPH.
